name: Fungrep
tag_list: mobile, game, smartphone, ios, android, bingo, sng, social, network
overview:
Main Products & Services

  1. Mobile Games

Developing & Publishing Mobile Games for iPhone, Android, MS Mobile, Samsung Bada Etc.

1.1. Domestic: Pudding Hero, Club Motgo, Club Poker, Club Go Stop

1.2. Overseas: Spot the difference – Seoul, Bingo Star 90 Live, Bingo City 75 Live, Jammy Dragon

1.3. Platforms: iOS(iPhone, iPad), Android(Google, T-Store, KT olleh, LG U+)

1.4. Genre: Social Network Gaming, MMO, Board, Arcade, Tycoon

  1. Online Games

Developing & Channeling Online Games for PC.

2.1. Domestic: TK games, www.tk.co.kr , 10 or more Games Development & Service.

2.2. Overseas: Face Book Bingo City Development & Service.

  1. Mobile Ad – Ad Booster

Mobile Ad Platform – Ad Booster Development & Service.

3.1. Ad Model: Cost Per Installation (CPI), Cost Per Action(CPA), Cost Per Click(CPC)

3.2. Market: Google market, SKT T-Store, KT olleh market

3.3. Our Clients & Partners : Com2us, Bluepepper, Neowiz, Nas Media, Mezzo Media

3.4. URL : http://adbooster.kr
